name: PowerPlan Consultants
overview: Powerplan Consultants, Inc., a software and consulting company, engages in the development, support, and maintenance of data warehouse, project, asset, depreciation, and tax software for asset intensive industries and companies in the United States and Canada. The company offers an integrated PowerPlant suite of products for a range of management and accounting applications, as well as provides business process consulting and workflow analysis, data conversion and data cleansing, integration design and development, product training, and maintenance and support services. It also offers data warehouse, project accounting, closing, unitization, asset accounting, book depreciation, depreciation studies, leased asset accounting, tax depreciation, deferred tax, monthly tax provision, and property tax software, as well as operating and capital budgeting services. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Atlanta, Georgia.
